input_email_body:
Subject: Patient Records Compromised by Data Breach

An unauthorized access incident led to a data breach affecting patient records. The cause might be weak firewall configurations You can reach me at sophia.rossi@service.it.. Despite restarting servers and using Malwarebytes for scanning, the problem still exists. Urgent help is required to address this issue and safeguard sensitive information. My name is Liu Wei.
